From Gstaad or Villars, Villars summer only

Les Diablerets Glacier, wonderful views of Western Switzerland from Mont Blanc to the Matterhorn and the Eiger, the Musee des Ormonts at Vers l'Eglise, some 17th century chalets, exhibitions at La Hotte
ski, walk, play tennis,mountain biking swim in the pool or at Lac Retaud golf at the Golf Club de Villars, crazy golf at Les Sources, rock climbing, Via Ferrata, parascending
the Auberge de l'Ours at Vers l'Eglise, the Auberge de la Poste, Les Vioz
